Package entityClasses

Class User

java.lang.Object
entityClasses.User
public class User extends Object

Title: User Class

Description: This User class represents a user entity in the system. It contains the user's details such as userName, password, and roles being played.

    • User

      public User(String userName, String password, String fn, String mn, String ln, String pfn, String ea, boolean r1, boolean r2, boolean r3)

      Method: User(String userName, String password, String fn, String mn, String ln, String pfn, String ea, boolean r1, boolean r2, boolean r3)

      Description: Constructs a new User object with full profile information and role assignments. Supports the staff and admin features that involve user creation and management.

      Parameters:
      userName - the unique username for this user
      password - the userâs password
      fn - the userâs first name
      mn - the userâs middle name
      ln - the userâs last name
      pfn - the userâs preferred first name
      ea - the userâs email address
      r1 - true if this user has the Admin role
      r2 - true if this user has the Student role
      r3 - true if this user has the Staff role
